thread.title: Former NBA star Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel
thread.title_full: Former NBA star Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel

title: Former NBA star Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel
text: > Top News Former NBA star Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel FILE - This Jan. 2, 2013 file photo shows Los Angeles Clippers' Lamar Odom (7) in action against the Golden State Warriors during an NBA basketball game in Oakland, Calif. Authorities say former NBA and reality TV star Odom has been hospitalized after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel. Nye County Sheriff Sharon A. Wehrly says the department got a call Tuesday afternoon, Oct. 13, 2015, requesting an ambulance for an unresponsive man at the Love Ranch in Crystal, Nevada about 70 miles outside of Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Marcio Jose Sanchez, File)
